morphInfos.tenseExplained: it was happening in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (the same as Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action actually happens
morphInfos.personExplained: they are a person or thing being spoken or written about
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that was happening - done by a person or thing being discussed
